This is one of those games where it is so hard to start writing a review about it simply because of how massive and iconic it is. The amount of memories and hours I have put into this game as a child is staggering (and most likely extremely unhealthy). However it must be said, CSS, alongside its predecessor, CS 1.6, are iconic staples on the FPS genre. Without these two games, the genre would never have been the way it is today. 

As for how the game stands today, I would personally say that it holds its own. The gameplay feels fun and is very nostalgic and the community is pretty damn good for a game that is 16-years old. Finding populated servers should not be an issue whatsoever.
